definition: spirit reaches to the rainbow/full of noble aspiration and daring

sentences.english: However, in Sichuan Changhong's color TV sets and mobile phones will have better performance.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在四川長虹的彩電和手機將有更好的表現。

sentences.english: Changhong Century Town is located at Peicheng District, Mianyang City. Its Phase I was already built up.
sentences.chinese: 長虹世紀城位於綿陽涪城區，世紀城一期基本建成。

sentences.english: The Chinese nation, is the Spirit in the Dapeng wings.
sentences.chinese: 中華民族，是氣貫長虹的大鵬展翅。

sentences.english: Changhong made the first step towards the goal.
sentences.chinese: 在這方面，長虹公司率先走出了第一步。

sentences.english: There is long rainbow Corp. in Shaanxi Xian Yang City?
sentences.chinese: 陝西咸陽有長虹集團嗎？

sentences.english: Like a rainbow, the Seventeen-arch Bridge is captivating, lying on the lake in the mists.
sentences.chinese: 浩淼煙波中，十七孔橋似長虹偃月橫臥水面。

sentences.english: Water molecules in the river by the day, young of long rainbow smiling face cunning and warm.
sentences.chinese: 瀾水河畔長虹經天，少年的笑臉狡黠而暖和。

sentences.english: But not all people are concerned about the Changhong industry.
sentences.chinese: 但是，並非所有的人都關心長虹產業。

sentences.english: Thank you for calling the Changhong.
Changhong incident for too long, I do not know.
sentences.chinese: 有些人可能會說，四川長虹事件太長時間，我不知道。

sentences.chinese: 有些人可能會說，四川長虹事件太長時間，我不知道。

definition: Danfeng County in Shangluo 商洛[Shang1 luo4], Shaanxi
lit. ten thousand fathoms/fig. extremely high or deep/lofty/bottomless

the five ranges separating Hunan and Jiangxi from south China, esp. Guangdong and Guangxi, namely: Dayu 大庾嶺|大庾岭[Da4 yu3 ling3], Dupang 都龐嶺|都庞岭[Du1 pang2 ling3], Qitian 騎田嶺|骑田岭[Qi2 tian2 ling3], Mengzhu 萌渚嶺|萌渚岭[Meng2 zhu3 ling3] and Yuecheng 越城嶺|越城岭[Yue4 cheng2 ling3]
traditional art form, consisting of sung story telling with musical accompaniment
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
Xincheng county level city in Huludao 葫蘆島|葫芦岛[Hu2 lu2 dao3], Liaoning
sudden clap of thunder/fig. surprising turn of events
